S1.T1.caption: TABLE I: Nomenclature
S1.T1.table:
Notations Definitions
Q𝑄Q Number of workers
N𝑁N Number of reliable workers
B𝐵B Number of faulty workers
G𝐺G Maximum gradient power of penalty functions
λ𝜆\lambda Weight factor for penalty functions
f0​(w0)subscript𝑓0subscript𝑤0f_{0}\left(w_{0}\right) Regularization function at the server at w0subscript𝑤0w_{0}
fn​(wn)subscript𝑓𝑛subscript𝑤𝑛f_{n}\left(w_{n}\right) Local loss at the n𝑛nth worker at wnsubscript𝑤𝑛w_{n}
f​(wn;xn)𝑓subscript𝑤𝑛subscript𝑥𝑛f\left(w_{n};x_{n}\right) Loss value at the n𝑛nth worker w.r.t. random variable xnsubscript𝑥𝑛x_{n}
pn​(w0−wn)subscript𝑝𝑛subscript𝑤0subscript𝑤𝑛p_{n}\left(w_{0}-w_{n}\right) Penalty function at the n𝑛nth worker
βksubscript𝛽𝑘\beta_{k} Step size in the k𝑘kth slot
α0,ksubscript𝛼0𝑘\alpha_{0,k}, αn,ksubscript𝛼𝑛𝑘\alpha_{n,k} Step sizes in the k𝑘kth slot of server and the n𝑛nth worker
u0,ksubscript𝑢0𝑘u_{0,k}, v0,ksubscript𝑣0𝑘v_{0,k} Auxiliary sequences at the server in the k𝑘kth slot
un,ksubscript𝑢𝑛𝑘u_{n,k}, vn,ksubscript𝑣𝑛𝑘v_{n,k} Auxiliary sequences at the n𝑛nth worker in the k𝑘kth slot
w0,ksubscript𝑤0𝑘w_{0,k} Model parameters at the server in the k𝑘kth slot
wn,ksubscript𝑤𝑛𝑘w_{n,k} Model parameters at the n𝑛nth worker in the k𝑘kth slot
gn,ksubscript𝑔𝑛𝑘g_{n,k} Gradient of the n𝑛nth penalty λ​∇w0pn​(w0,k−wn,k)𝜆subscript∇subscript𝑤0subscript𝑝𝑛subscript𝑤0𝑘subscript𝑤𝑛𝑘\lambda\nabla_{w_{0}}p_{n}\left(w_{0,k}-w_{n,k}\right)
Δ0,ksubscriptΔ0𝑘\Delta_{0,k} Gradient noise at the server, i.e., ∑n=N+1Qgn,ksuperscriptsubscript𝑛𝑁1𝑄subscript𝑔𝑛𝑘\sum\nolimits_{n=N+1}^{Q}g_{n,k}
Δn,ksubscriptΔ𝑛𝑘\Delta_{n,k} Gradient noise at the n𝑛nth worker in the k𝑘kth slot
references: The nomenclature of this work is listed in Table I.
